name: executeWebscript

metadata.description:
executeWebscript Sensor


This sensor allows you to trigger a waylay webscript execution (https://webscripts.waylay.io/webscripts).

States
  • Success: The action was executed successfully
  • Error: The action execution failed

Raw Data
  • response (only returns on Success state)
  • errorMessage (only returned on Error state)

Properties
  • name: The name of the webscript you wish to trigger
  • version (optional): The version of the webscript you want to trigger
  • body: Body passed directly to the webscript as a JSON
